verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] seized on an error by liberal activists for tweeting photos of detainees at the U.S .- Mexico border .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: seized] [ARG1: on an error by liberal activists for tweeting photos of detainees at the U.S .- Mexico border] .
